name: The Jack Rose Deluxe
description: In "The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks," David A. Embury lists the Jack Rose as one of "Six Basic Cocktails." I've adjusted his recipe to make one four-and-a-half-ounce cocktail; you can play with the proportions of the lemon juice and grenadine further, to make it as tart or as sweet as you like.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine applejack, lemon juice and grenadine in a shaker filled with ice (preferably cracked ice). Shake vigorously, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel.
